title: What do you think of Garth Brooks' music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was born and lived in Montana and now live in Idaho. I have been to the major cities for work such as Seattle, Chicago and New York. Loved visiting. Loved coming home more. Garth's music paints the culture, love, challenges and optimism of we flyover, Bible-carrying, community-loving rednecks beautifully. A good beat and tune too.
